channel.title: Ghidra on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration
channel.description: Recent content in Ghidra on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration

item.title: Delving into BlueNorOff malware
item.description: In this article, we examine a newer strand of Bluenoroff malware from late 2023 on MacOS systems. It’s our first look at a strand of malware from an APT.

item.title: HTB Challenge: Simple Encryptor Part 1
item.description: Pulling apart a custom simple encryptor from a Hack the Box RE challenge using Ghidra. Part 1 of 2 explores the static analysis process.
